metadata.project_name: Substrate Phase 7: UX Refinement and Delivery

work_areas.title: UX Foundation
work_areas.description: Establish the new root UI structure and validate the Next.js delivery path.

work_areas.title: Governance Integration
work_areas.description: Integrate the governance CLI and state reporting into the new Next.js UI.

work_areas.title: Repo Simplification
work_areas.description: Remove template marketplace/substrate bloat and restore a lightweight control plane + app placeholder baseline.

work_areas.title: Shipping Hygiene
work_areas.description: Enforce source-only shipping so installable/generated artifacts are never included in clone-and-own releases.

work_areas.title: Governance Enhancements Program
work_areas.description: Implement PRD-SUB-2026-002 lifecycle + semantic governance enhancements with deterministic controls and full governance-doc synchronization.

work_areas.title: Governance Hardening Gaps
work_areas.description: Address post-review minor gaps: test coverage, ontology depth/clarity, drift-check semantics, documented defaults, and Gemini lifecycle parity.

packets.title: Establish Root UI Structure
packets.scope: Move active UX to root /ui directory, update package.json, and verify development server startup. Output: Functional Next.js app in /ui.

packets.title: Validate Delivery Path
packets.scope: Verify build, lint, and typecheck commands for the new UI structure. Output: Successful 'npm run build' in /ui.

packets.title: Baseline and scope freeze
packets.scope: Capture current control-plane behavior, route map, and dependency usage before refactor. Output: written baseline notes and file inventory for safe deletion boundaries.

packets.title: Remove marketplace surface
packets.scope: Delete ui/app/marketplace routes and layout, remove marketplace navigation entry points, and ensure no control-plane path references marketplace routes.

packets.title: Reduce app UX to placeholder
packets.scope: Keep only the App placeholder experience and required shell layout; remove starter app pages not required for control-plane operation.

packets.title: Converge to single WBS JSON
packets.scope: Retain .governance/wbs.json as canonical definition and remove/archive extra tracked WBS variants, updating docs/scripts to reflect single-definition policy.

packets.title: Remove substrate duplication artifacts
packets.scope: Eliminate generated substrate/dist recursive snapshot outputs from workspace and add guardrails (.gitignore/docs/script) to prevent reintroduction.

packets.title: Prune UI dependencies and validate
packets.scope: Remove unused UI dependencies introduced by marketplace/template code and validate lint/typecheck/build plus governance validation commands.

packets.title: Define source-only shipping contract
packets.scope: Document a canonical shipping policy: ship from git source only, never from working directory snapshots, and explicitly list allowed vs forbidden artifacts for clone-and-own release bundles.

packets.title: Implement shipping gate script
packets.scope: Create scripts/shipping-check.sh to fail when forbidden artifacts are present or tracked (node_modules, .next, dist, substrate snapshots, other generated payloads) and emit actionable remediation steps.

packets.title: Wire shipping checks into CI
packets.scope: Add CI workflow step(s) that run shipping-check and block merges/releases on violation; ensure failure output is concise and policy-aligned.

packets.title: Add release-safe cleanup tooling
packets.scope: Provide an explicit pre-release cleanup command/script that removes local generated/install artifacts without touching tracked source, and document safe usage.

packets.title: Add release packaging path
packets.scope: Define and document release packaging via git archive (or equivalent source-only packaging path) to guarantee untracked artifacts are excluded from shipped bundles.

packets.title: Validate shipping hygiene end-to-end
packets.scope: Run shipping checks plus build/lint/typecheck on a clean workspace and produce evidence showing release bundles exclude installable/generated libraries while retaining reproducible setup via lockfiles.

packets.title: PRD hardening and execution contract
packets.scope: Convert PRD-SUB-2026-002 draft into implementation-ready contract decisions (identity model, deterministic gating boundaries, migration/version policy, authority model) and publish as governed design doc.

packets.title: State machine and log schema extension design
packets.scope: Define canonical enum/state transitions for PREFLIGHT, STALLED, REVIEW, ESCALATED plus structured event schema/versioning for preflight, heartbeat, review, ontology, and template events.

packets.title: Governance document baseline update
packets.scope: Update constitution, AGENTS.md, README, and governance workflow docs to describe new lifecycle states, role boundaries, and migration posture before feature implementation begins.

packets.title: Pre-flight engine transitions
packets.scope: Implement PREFLIGHT state handling with packet/global preflight_required controls, transition guards, timeout fallback to pending, and append-only event logging.

packets.title: Pre-flight CLI and API surface
packets.scope: Add preflight, preflight-approve, preflight-return command/API paths with validation of readiness assessment structure and supervisor decision recording.

packets.title: Pre-flight dashboard integration
packets.scope: Add preflight status visibility, assessment viewer, and approval/return controls in control-plane UI without breaking existing packet views.

packets.title: Heartbeat telemetry ingestion
packets.scope: Add heartbeat command/API ingestion and structured event persistence fields (status, decisions, obstacles, estimate) with packet-level heartbeat_required controls.

packets.title: Stall detection and STALLED transitions
packets.scope: Implement heartbeat interval policy, auto-transition to STALLED on missed threshold, resume/reassignment semantics, and supervisor alert hooks.

packets.title: Telemetry dashboard stream
packets.scope: Add packet heartbeat timeline, age indicators, and stalled-state highlighting to control-plane UX with filterable packet-level history.

packets.title: Context manifest and attestation core
packets.scope: Implement context_manifest and project context_policy parsing/validation plus claim-time required-file attestation enforcement and warning-level optional-file handling.

packets.title: Context attestation UX and reporting
packets.scope: Expose context attestation evidence and policy violations in packet viewer/status outputs and API payloads for supervisor review.

packets.title: Phase A test and migration suite
packets.scope: Deliver regression and migration tests covering preflight, heartbeat/stall, and context governance with backward compatibility for legacy packets lacking new fields.

packets.title: Review state and two-person integrity core
packets.scope: Implement REVIEW and ESCALATED transitions, review cycle policy, and hard rejection of same-identity executor/reviewer assignments.

packets.title: Review CLI/API and assessment model
packets.scope: Add review-claim, review-submit, review-escalate command/API paths and required structured review assessment validation.

packets.title: Review dashboard and verdict history
packets.scope: Add review queue, reviewer identity visibility, verdict history, and reject/resubmit cycle indicators in control-plane UI.

packets.title: Golden template promotion core
packets.scope: Implement promote/templates storage model under .governance/templates with versioning, deprecation metadata, and sanitized capture rules.

packets.title: Template reference validation and analytics
packets.scope: Implement template_ref packet checks, non-blocking conformance warnings, and usage/outcome statistics reporting for dashboard/API.

packets.title: Phase B test and migration suite
packets.scope: Deliver regression tests for review integrity and template lifecycle plus migration compatibility for repositories without template metadata.

packets.title: Ontology artifact model bootstrap
packets.scope: Introduce ontology.md and ontology.json contract loaders, schema validation, version tracking, and project-level enablement switches.

packets.title: Deterministic ontology validation on completion
packets.scope: Implement entity/relationship/invariant deterministic checks on done/review submission paths with configurable warning/error severity handling.

packets.title: Ontology mutation governance workflow
packets.scope: Implement ontology-propose/approve/reject/history flow with append-only provenance and prohibition of unmanaged ontology mutation paths.

packets.title: Ontology drift detection and health metrics
packets.scope: Add cross-packet drift heuristics (advisory mode), dashboard ontology health indicators, and supervisor escalation hooks for persistent unresolved drift.

packets.title: Phase C test and migration suite
packets.scope: Deliver ontology governance regression tests (validation, mutation, drift signals) and backward-compatible migration behavior when ontology governance is disabled.

packets.title: Comprehensive governance doc synchronization
packets.scope: Synchronize constitution, AGENTS.md, README, governance workflow docs, packet standards, and ontology guidance so runtime behavior and documentation are aligned post-implementation.

packets.title: Program integration, rollout, and closeout report
packets.scope: Run end-to-end integration validation across phases, capture residual risks and rollout notes, and publish final delivery report with evidence references for all PRD enhancements.

packets.title: Test harness bootstrap
packets.scope: Create a tests/ baseline for governance engine and CLI pathways so CI discovery has concrete coverage entrypoints. Output: tests/ directory, test package scaffolding, and smoke tests wired for python3 -m unittest discover -s tests -v.

packets.title: Lifecycle transition unit tests
packets.scope: Add focused unit tests for preflight approve/return, heartbeat stall/resume, and review approve/reject/escalate with two-person integrity enforcement and max-cycle auto-escalation.

packets.title: Ontology validation depth upgrade
packets.scope: Replace substring-only ontology checks with deterministic token/field-aware checks for anti-aliases, anti-conflations, relationship constraints, and invariant evaluation hooks; keep deterministic behavior and backward compatibility.

packets.title: Ontology and drift semantics documentation
packets.scope: Document current and upgraded ontology enforcement depth explicitly in README/governance docs, and align drift-check naming/description with actual implemented behavior to avoid overclaiming semantics.

packets.title: Domain ontology reference template
packets.scope: Provide a domain-focused ontology example/template (program/project/work_package/milestone/deliverable/risk/approval) for regulated infrastructure use cases, with mapping guidance from the core governance ontology.

packets.title: Heartbeat policy defaults surfaced
packets.scope: Surface and document heartbeat interval/stall-threshold defaults in constitution and README plus operator workflow docs; ensure defaults map exactly to engine config values.

packets.title: Gemini lifecycle parity update
packets.scope: Update GEMINI.md guidance to mirror CLAUDE/Codex lifecycle capabilities including preflight, heartbeat, review, template, and ontology governance commands.

packets.title: Gap-closure integration validation
packets.scope: Run end-to-end validation for the new hardening packets, capture residual risks, and publish a concise closure report covering test evidence and documentation alignment.
